verbs.description: [ARG1: This] [V: is] [ARG2: a good interview from Australian TV of Sam Harris , giving opinions on Trump , identity politics , Islam and free will . Well worth a listen . His incredulity about Trump ’s presidency and the impact on truth dissemination is on point] .
